english.segment1: Well I need to be more than I have been. Well I need to be more than I have been. Not for myself, but for all men. Well I need to be more than I have been, and
english.segment2: I need to do more than I have done, and. I need to do more than I have done. Not for myself, for everyone. I need to do more than I have done, and
english.segment3: Chorus: It's about time, That I try to live my life. For more than myself
english.segment4: It's about time, That I try to live my life. For Jesus and walk in his steps
english.segment5: Bridge: For too long I've been, such a selfish man. Leading my whole life, just for myself. Now I've been given, a second chance, and. I'm not going to let it slip away.
english.segment6: I need to love more than I have loved, and. I need to love more than I have loved. Miss you I never, given up, and. I need to love more than I have loved
